record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2247
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2247 -- (Senate - October 26, 2007)

[Page: S13495]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that there is a bill at the desk due for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2247) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the depreciation classification of motor sports entertainment complexes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for a second reading, and in order to place the bill on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV, I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
